title: When was the idea of a camera first proposed? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Camera” come from the word for “chamber”. The camera obscura is a device that produces an image on one side of a darkened chamber. Occasions of this process go back to ancient times. Camera obscura - Wikipedia The desire to make permanent these temporary images encouraged chemist-aware people like Nicéphore Niépce to investigate the possibility in the early 19th Century.
